snippet.textDisplay: This game might not be up there with my favorites in the Bomberman franchise, mainly due to its average story mode, but the multiplayer was still super fun and I always liked its colorful isometric presentation. This theme is very pleasant, it has those bumpy high synths that remind me of Mario Galaxy.
snippet.textOriginal: This game might not be up there with my favorites in the Bomberman franchise, mainly due to its average story mode, but the multiplayer was still super fun and I always liked its colorful isometric presentation. This theme is very pleasant, it has those bumpy high synths that remind me of Mario Galaxy.

snippet.textDisplay: This OST Jun created really was Vaporwavey from time to time. I really liked all off the tracks but the trippy ones were the best.
snippet.textOriginal: This OST Jun created really was Vaporwavey from time to time. I really liked all off the tracks but the trippy ones were the best.

snippet.textDisplay: The only good thing about the quarantine is that I got to listen to your list from start to finish once more. Thanks for all the great songs Supra.
snippet.textOriginal: The only good thing about the quarantine is that I got to listen to your list from start to finish once more. Thanks for all the great songs Supra.

snippet.textDisplay: This just blew me away, stellar find
snippet.textOriginal: This just blew me away, stellar find

snippet.textDisplay: Glad to see this song getting some love, I'd also say the menu screen music is great as well. Such a beautiful bassy synth and crisp sound. It's amazing how the faux-3d sprite work really held up.
snippet.textOriginal: Glad to see this song getting some love, I'd also say the menu screen music is great as well. Such a beautiful bassy synth and crisp sound. It's amazing how the faux-3d sprite work really held up.

snippet.textDisplay: I don't like this song. It sounds so pleasantly and joyfully aquatic that it's giving me swimmer's ear.
snippet.textOriginal: I don't like this song. It sounds so pleasantly and joyfully aquatic that it's giving me swimmer's ear.

snippet.textDisplay: You might as well put the whole soundtrack on here because this game has one of the best ever put on the PS1.
snippet.textOriginal: You might as well put the whole soundtrack on here because this game has one of the best ever put on the PS1.

snippet.textDisplay: This game was so much fun with a crew of peeps. Crazy times trying to trap each other when you were already dead to see who gets to come back to life
snippet.textOriginal: This game was so much fun with a crew of peeps. Crazy times trying to trap each other when you were already dead to see who gets to come back to life

snippet.textDisplay: Love this franchise. Great game, great soundtrack. I should play a bomberman song in one of my upcoming game piano videos! Didn't even think of it until now! Thanks for sharing.
snippet.textOriginal: Love this franchise. Great game, great soundtrack. I should play a bomberman song in one of my upcoming game piano videos! Didn't even think of it until now! Thanks for sharing.

snippet.textDisplay: B o m B o r W a v e
snippet.textOriginal: B o m B o r W a v e

snippet.textDisplay: Woah. I just searched videos of this game after seeing this and I forgot I played this as a kid. I didn't make it very far so I only ever saw the first few forest levels with the blue jewels and cutesy cows. It's weird experiencing an early memory unlock in your head.
snippet.textOriginal: Woah. I just searched videos of this game after seeing this and I forgot I played this as a kid. I didn't make it very far so I only ever saw the first few forest levels with the blue jewels and cutesy cows. It's weird experiencing an early memory unlock in your head.

snippet.textDisplay:
YES FINALLY
SOMEONE ELSE ACKNOWLEDGES ONE OF THE BEST CLASSIC BOMBERMAN FORMULA GAMES!!!!
snippet.textOriginal:
YES FINALLY
SOMEONE ELSE ACKNOWLEDGES ONE OF THE BEST CLASSIC BOMBERMAN FORMULA GAMES!!!!

snippet.textDisplay: I didn't even know there was a Bomberman game on the playstation. I played Bomberman 64.
snippet.textOriginal: I didn't even know there was a Bomberman game on the playstation. I played Bomberman 64.

snippet.textDisplay: And the N64 even had 4 different Bomberman games. How times have changed.
snippet.textOriginal: And the N64 even had 4 different Bomberman games. How times have changed.

snippet.textDisplay: There's actually a few on the PS1 I believe this game,  Bomberman Party Edition a remake of the NES Bomberman but with a huge battle mode that brings back characters from Super Bomberman 3 & 4, Bomberman Wars a japan only strategy game that also serves as a prequel to Bomberman World and Bomberman Fantasy Race a racing game. I think there's more but those are ones I can think of off the top of my head.
snippet.textOriginal: There's actually a few on the PS1 I believe this game,  Bomberman Party Edition a remake of the NES Bomberman but with a huge battle mode that brings back characters from Super Bomberman 3 & 4, Bomberman Wars a japan only strategy game that also serves as a prequel to Bomberman World and Bomberman Fantasy Race a racing game. I think there's more but those are ones I can think of off the top of my head.
